sentences.english: Put some greenery along the mantle to soften the edge a little bit.
sentences.chinese: 沿着壁爐架擺放了一些綠葉以使邊線看起來柔和一點。

sentences.english: I'd love to see Ingleside again.
sentences.chinese: 我很想再看一次壁爐山莊。

sentences.english: The Loggia overlooks the cactus garden and outdoor fireplace.
sentences.chinese: 長廊眺望仙人掌花園和戶外壁爐。

sentences.english: On the mantel were photographs of a man and a woman.
sentences.chinese: 壁爐架上面是一對男女的一些照片。

sentences.english: He was watching the red flames in the wide open fireplace .
sentences.chinese: 他注視着敞着的寬大壁爐裏的熊熊火焰。

sentences.english: The outdoor fireplace makes for a very romantic place to entertain.
sentences.chinese: 戶外壁爐是非常浪漫的待客地方。

sentences.english: Never place your tree near a heat source, such as a fireplace or portable heater.
sentences.chinese: 讓樹遠離熱源，比如壁爐或便攜式加熱器。

sentences.english: That's a mantelpiece cluttered up with all kinds of doodad .
sentences.chinese: 那是個擺滿了各種小玩意兒的壁爐架。

sentences.english: He tapped his pipe out into the fireplace.
sentences.chinese: 他把菸斗的菸灰敲到壁爐裏。

sentences.english: The gold landed in their stockings drying beside the fireplace.
sentences.chinese: 這些金子掉入她們掛在壁爐烘乾的長襪中。

sentences.english: Cosette dropped her head, and went for an empty bucket which stood near the chimney-corner.
sentences.chinese: 珂賽特低下了頭，走到壁爐角上取了一隻空桶。

sentences.english: Lady Catherine's drawing rooms costs eight hundred pounds.
sentences.chinese: 甚至凱瑟琳夫人一個畫室的壁爐架就價值八百英鎊。

sentences.english: I still have that school paper framed over the fire place.
sentences.chinese: 我至今還把我在學習的那篇文章用框子框在壁爐上。

sentences.english: Hestia , Goddess of the Hearth, did not enjoy sex.
sentences.chinese: 赫斯提，壁爐之女神，並不喜好性。

sentences.english: When the central- heating was installed, the fireplaces were walled up.
sentences.chinese: 安裝暖氣設備之後，便把壁爐封閉起來了。

sentences.english: These candlesticks held two wax candles, and usually figured on the Bishop's chimney-piece.
sentences.chinese: 那對燭臺上插着兩支燭，經常陳設在主教的壁爐上。
